displayName.text: Marble Hill High School for International Studies

formattedAddress: 99 Terrace View Ave, Bronx, NY 10463, USA
adrFormatAddress: 99 Terrace View Ave, Bronx, NY 10463, USA

originalText.text: This school is the bane of my existence. Every step gives me another reason on the consensus of society's mentally insane state. I can't thoroughly express my thoughts on this institution in this small paragraph, but if I was paid a very large sum of money to write a good review, I would reject it in an instant. The administrators are purely ravenous to the students, not to mention the surrounding campus  filled with undomesticated animals that would drive even the most stable-minded individual psychotic. I would rather go swimming in frozen Antarctic waters for a week straight than continue going here.

text.text: This school is the bane of my existence. Every step gives me another reason on the consensus of society's mentally insane state. I can't thoroughly express my thoughts on this institution in this small paragraph, but if I was paid a very large sum of money to write a good review, I would reject it in an instant. The administrators are purely ravenous to the students, not to mention the surrounding campus  filled with undomesticated animals that would drive even the most stable-minded individual psychotic. I would rather go swimming in frozen Antarctic waters for a week straight than continue going here.

originalText.text:
DO NOT come to this school whatsoever! I will probably be saving a lot of students high schools lives because I don't want you to experience what I went through as a person at this school. This is not where you want to be. This school treats everyone like prisoners with their strict rules and everything. Rules are good to keep control and order but once you come here, it's on a different level and you literally can't do anything wrong or make a mistake. Learning requires a good experience and good people to be around and this school does not have that. We have 8 schools in one building so you will be spending your whole 4 years on only one floor. Trust me when I say this, you will regret coming here. High School allows a bit more freedom and this school takes all that away from you. For freshman year you have to be in the "fish bowl or common area" meaning a certain place on the floor which only contain a couple of rooms. You will be with the same students for 2 years like you did for kindergarten. After that, then they will split you up for junior and senior year. I am a really good student with high hopes and this school has done nothing to help me. Please don't make the same mistake as I did, I hope all of you reading this review will take this into consideration seriously and believe me. The staff are enslaved to the principal and dean who are terrible people. Go somewhere else and make sure it's a great school. Uniform is required so if you want a little bit more freedom, search for schools that don't require it. (Boys wear ties with white oxford shirts and girls have the same but no tie. It's really stupid)
If you don;t believe me, see it for yourself. But i'm going to warn you that once you come in for freshman year and you want to transfer to another high school because of the issues, there is a slight chance of you going into a high school of your choice. Please be careful and make the right decision. I messed up because i waited until the second round to choose my high school. I want to save many of you from coming to this prison hell hole. This school is considered the BEST only because we have 7 other TERRIBLE schools, so we seem like we are really "GOOD." This high school has ruined my life and i wish i could go back in time and change what i did. Other students who great strudents have left right after because they knew that this school sucks. Please don't come here

originalText.text: It's a great high-school. The teachers here are amazing. The gym hours can be annoying, but it's fine cause you can play a wider range of sports.

text.text: It's a great high-school. The teachers here are amazing. The gym hours can be annoying, but it's fine cause you can play a wider range of sports.

originalText.text: It's a good school very helpful teachers helpful staff, overall it's a school that's just one of a kind.

originalText.text: My first high school and I will say it's the best. Decipline, and teachers are lovely.üòç
